about_the_game:
Welcome to WildRoot, a tranquil colony-building adventure!

Step into a wild and untamed world where you'll guide your colony to prosperity. Build homes, grow resources, and create a harmonious community as you explore diverse biomes. Whether you're farming, hunting, or trading, every decision shapes the future of your settlement.

Key Features

  • Dynamic Biomes: Expand your colony across varied landscapes, each with unique resources, wildlife, and challenges.

  • Colony Management: Balance colonists’ needs, manage their moods, and assign jobs to keep everyone productive and happy.

  • Resource Gathering: Farm, mine, and hunt to sustain your colony, then trade for rare and valuable resources.

  • Strategic Growth: Unlock new resources, upgrade your colony, and adapt to the evolving environment.

  • Relaxing Gameplay: With no combat, focus on creativity, strategy, and nurturing your colony in a peaceful setting.

Embark on a journey of growth, exploration, and community in WildRoot. Perfect for players who enjoy nature-inspired, resource management games with a chill vibe.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 2-core 2.4 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950, Radeon R9 380 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 4-core 2.9 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070, Radeon RX 5700 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Build a thriving colony! Construct homes, farm crops, and hunt wildlife while keeping your settlers happy. Trade, unlock new resources, and expand your settlement into a vibrant, self-sustaining community. Grow, create, and explore in this immersive colony-building adventure!
